hackathon-description-text: Are you Interested in being smart about the latest technology trends in your industry? Have an idea you want to test out or simply want to have fun and compete for cash and glory?

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Professor  Mechanical Engineering and Applied Mechanics (MEAM)
Adjunct Associate Professor Integrated Product Design (IPD)

hackathon-rules: Please do not use materials created before today. Please be respectful of other teams and do not plagarize from other teams.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Technology: Software - Sponsored by the Dining Philosophers

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Direct entry to 2nd round of Pennvention
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Technology: Hardware - Sponsored by the Weiss Tech House

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2401 Walnut Street, Philadelphia, PA 19103, USA
hackathon-description-header: Want to know how to turn a great idea into a product? From problem identification to ideation, prototyping and testing, we're hosting a 1-day workshop and competition on product development!
